item.description:
I've been wanting to go to Jacob Wirth for years, and just haven't been there yet. I heard they have a great beer selection did hear good things about their German food too.
It's in the Theater District and very close to Boston Common, and Boylston St (Green line) and Chinatown(Orange line) T stops.
Parking lot is also available as well.

It's the second oldest restaurant in Boston and have the largest selection of imported beers on draft in the New England area, according to their website.

This is their menu http://www.jacobwirth... and you can also check out yelp reviews here. http://www.yelp.com/b...

*UPDATE*
I decided not to make a reservation, and scratched out the dinner idea. We can have snacks and drinks without having to sit down at a huge group table, and i can open up the number for more people! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sun (See pic) or call her (I'll email my cell # to the RSVPs)
item.name: Drinks at Jacob Wirth
